data.actual_result: The emoji is not added. (Important to note it will only work with some emojis. For example, it’s not working with 🚨)
data.expected_result: The emoji will write correctly and all peoples with this emoji in their name will be shown in the preview.
data.short_description: Emojis not writing when trying to mention someone manually
data.steps_to_repro: - Get in a text channel you can write in. - Write a « @ ». - Add an emoji.
